ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] A possible way to make Disarm Traps useful?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey!  I knew that name was familiar from somewhere!!!!!!!!!!! I never made the connection! Its amazing the fols you run into in totally different virtaul
ygData.messageBody:
Hey! I knew that name was familiar from somewhere!!!!!!!!!!!

I never made the connection!

Its amazing the fols you run into in totally different virtaul worlds.

Kit

At 12:26 PM 6/13/00 -0700, you wrote:
>Did you, perchance, at one time play DragonRealms? They did loot just this
>way, only everyone got Disarm Traps skill.


Heh - DragonRealms... Where Talies was important ;)

Talies the Wanderer
